name: Canadian Science Education Academic Genealogy (May 2014)
description: This image presents an academic genealogy of Canadian Science Education Researchers in Canada. Key for Individuals: - Current Canadian Science Education Researchers (Orange) - Supervisors that have been identified as Canadian Education Researchers in other disciplines (Blue) - Supervisors for which the discipline is unknown (Grey) *Colors of the lines indicate the geographic location of the supervisor.

citation.text: Wiseman, D., & Pegg, J. (2014). Considering the field: Science education research and researchers in the Canadian context. Paper presented at the Canadian Society for the Study of Education, St. Catharines, ON.
